name: Devansh Khanna
tagline: Associate Consultant | Business Analyst | Strategy & Ops
summary: Outcome-driven Business Analyst and Strategy Associate specializing in bridging the gap between data and decision-making. I thrive in high-ownership environments, helping AI-enabled product firms, SaaS, and FinTech companies convert complex processes into streamlined, automated workflows.

description: Generated ₹59K in sales via 200+ calls and 61 field visits; cleaned 1,200+ lead database improving quality scoring by 40%.
Orchestrated the end-to-end launch of a new Karaoke service, unlocking a new revenue stream and expanding market reach.
Managed ₹5+ crore revenue portfolio for OEM accounts (Hyzon, Kohler, Mitsubishi) through optimized pricing workflows
Built Power BI dashboards and Excel models for revenue forecasting, improving pricing accuracy by 12%
Automated ERP reporting using Excel macros, reducing processing time from 4 hours to 30 minutes weekly

details.problem: Need for structured reasoning in complex business decisions.
details.approach: Built decision tool using GoT, CoT, and ToT reasoning frameworks with Supabase backend for structured strategic analysis.
details.outcome: Improved understanding of decision logic, trade-offs, and AI-assisted reasoning under uncertainty.

details.problem: Manual resume screening is inconsistent and time-consuming.
details.approach: Automated resume parsing and scoring using XGBoost (85% accuracy) + Gemini API, reducing screening time by 70%.
details.outcome: Learned to translate business requirements into data pipelines and model-driven scoring systems.

details.problem: Identifying exploitable cross-exchange Bitcoin price inefficiencies under real-world constraints.
details.approach: Designed cross-exchange Bitcoin arbitrage framework identifying 15+ profitable opportunities across Indian exchanges.
details.outcome: Gained exposure to market microstructure, latency risk, and operational constraints in financial decision-making.

details.problem: Lack of data-driven insights into the social media engagement strategies of major QSR brands in India.
details.approach: Scraped Instagram data using ParseHub and performed comparative analysis using Python (Pandas, Seaborn) to evaluate engagement metrics.
details.outcome: Identified key content drivers and performance trends for McDonald's, Domino's, and KFC to optimize brand strategy.

achievements: National Finalist (Top 20 nationwide) – AIMA Student Management Games (SMG): Led team strategy as CEO, securing Regional 1st Runner-Up.
2nd Runner-Up – Youth’s Voice (BCC&I x NTPC): Developed practical sustainability-driven business frameworks focused on social and environmental impact.
L’Oréal Sustainability Challenge 2024 – Participated in national case-based competition on sustainable innovation.
HP Power Lab by Hindustan Petroleum – Participated in national business simulation challenge.

description: Led a 50-member team and executed growth strategy that scaled the club’s reach by 66% and increased engagement 5x.
Conceptualized and executed high-impact events like ‘Sheets & Beats’, tripling student participation.

extra_curricular: Led technical operations for 6+ national and international conferences, ensuring seamless execution and enhancing institutional visibility.
certifications: Data-Driven Decision-Making using Excel & SQL – NIT Trichy (Completed 3-week bootcamp on Excel automation and SQL fundamentals)
